## CameraRig.flyTo() method

Transition to a specific position and orientation in world space. Transform on eyes will be reset to 0 as a result of this.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
flyTo(position: Vector3, quaternion: Quaternion, duration?: number, ease?: string, useSlerp?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  position | Vector3 |  |
|  quaternion | Quaternion |  |
|  duration | number |  |
|  ease | string |  |
|  useSlerp | boolean |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
